quote: Consciousness is a magic of our brain and an illusion of our mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness is the awareness of the interaction and interdependence among mind, body, spirit, and the universe where it resides.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness is a transformational dynamic force which transforms us by changing our imaginations and perceptions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness resides in the gap between electrons, protons, and neutrons.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness makes you an unlimited being by giving the power of your imagination.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are the creation of your own consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness cannot be accounted for in physical terms. For consciousness is absolutely fundamental. It cannot be accounted for in terms of anything else.
author: Erwin Schrödinger

quote: Consciousness is nothing but a neuro-chemical and a mechanical action of the body. Consciousness is important, but the expression of thoughts with language makes us human. Everything is conscious, but levels of consciousness are different.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Consciousness does not just passively reflect the objective material world; it plays an active role in creating realityitself.
author: Stanislav Grof

quote: Consciousness is very personal like happiness, sadness, or awareness. You can only feel it and you cannot see it. It does not follow any quantum rules. It has no weight or dimension and does not occupy any space. Consciousness has no beginning and no end.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Like imagination, consciousness has no limits.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The level of consciousness determines the deepness of thoughts and the awareness of the beauty of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Don’t try to understand consciousness. Just try to be deeply conscious and it will reveal its secret to you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Higher consciousness means your self consciousness ceases to exist; you become the ocean of life and a part of the universe.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Molecules dissolve and pass away, but consciousness survives the death of the matter on which it rides.
author: Deepak Chopra,  The Way of the Wizard: Twenty Spiritual Lessons for Creating the Life You Want

quote: Control of consciousness determines the quality of life.
author: Mihaly Csikszentmihalyi,  Flow: The Psychology of Optimal Experience

quote: Your level of consciousness depends on your love and understanding of this universe and all its contents.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our awareness about ourselves and the world around us is so limited that we are ready to destroy ourselves. For the survival of humanity, an evolution of consciousness is essential.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When I tried to understand consciousness, I found out how simple it was, but we try to make it so complicated.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are the expression of consciousness; your thoughts are the expression of you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We live in a stocking which is in the process of being turned inside out, without our ever knowing for sure to what phase of the process our moment of consciousness corresponds.
author: Vladimir Nabokov,  Bend Sinister

quote: Consciousness is clear; it reflects colors of the vessel.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You are the byproduct of your level of consciousness, thoughts, and actions.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The consciousness of an embryo is the universal consciousness. What we learn after birth is awareness and egocentric consciousness that we call the mind. Everyday we learn to conform to the beauty, tragedy, and adversity of this world and that forms our judgmental mind.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Universal consciousness can never die; it can only transform and transcend.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The level of consciousness defines the beauty of our lives.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Every thing—every atom is conscious. To find it we have to open our eyes and see with a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: You were born to unlock your consciousness and be universal and infinite.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Everything has a consciousness. Every atom and molecule is conscious. Every virus and bacteria is conscious. Every tree, large and small animals are conscious, but each level of consciousness is different. All humans are conscious; the level of consciousness among humans also differs.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When I say that consciousness is an illusion I do not mean that consciousness does not exist. I mean that consciousness is not what it appears to be. If it seems to be a continuous stream of rich and detailed experiences, happening one after the other to a conscious person, this is the illusion.
author: Susan J. Blackmore

quote: When consciousness is there, can life be far away?
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let us record the atoms as they fall upon the mind in the order in which they fall, let us trace the pattern, however disconnected and incoherent in appearance, which each sight or incident scores upon the consciousness. Let us not take it for granted that life exists more fully in what is commonly thought big than in what is commonly thought small.
author: Virginia Woolf,  The Common Reader

quote: Self consciousness is the ultimate wisdom of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: What we call spirit is our universal consciousness. We can also call it atomic consciousness. Every atom is conscious and knows everything that is going on around it at every moment.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: As we learn, grow and prosper, consciousness takes on new expressions and intrinsically searches for purpose and meaning.
author: Joseph Rain

quote: Achieving higher levels of consciousness is the ultimate magic of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are barely conscious. With a higher consciousness we can open the door between infinite possibilities.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you achieve higher consciousness you will not achieve anything, but you will lose everything that is not important and is not yours.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Let your thoughts, intentions, imaginations, and dreams fly under a clear blue sky with a spring breeze floating like a butterfly from flower to flower. See the beauty of mankind. Enjoy the nectar of life. It will shift your awareness to a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our great human adventure is the evolution of consciousness. We are in this life to enlarge the soul, liberate the spirit, and light up the brain.
author: Tom Robbins,  Wild Ducks Flying Backward

quote: Birth and death: there was the same consciousness of heightened existence and of her own elevated importance
author: J.K. Rowling,  The Casual Vacancy

quote: The deep observation of nature can transform your consciousness into a higher consciousness that will awaken your true being.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Our consciousness is primitive; it is dependent on wants and needs.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We fill our lives with meaning by serving endlessly and by learning to transcend our consciousness to a higher consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you gain higher consciousness, your consciousness becomes universal and you become ageless, endless, and universal.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are the cosmos made conscious and life is the means by which the universe understands itself.
author: Brian Cox

quote: When someone achieves higher consciousness, he or she never dies. They only transform.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: We are the flower of eternal consciousness.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: To enhance your experience and consciousness, your mind is always trying to understand everything that is going on around you.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: True philosophy must start from the most immediate and comprehensive fact of consciousness: 'I am life that wants to live, in the midst of life that wants to live
author: Albert Schweitzer
